website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a bed-in-a-box mattress that's designed for side-sleepers, Helix's Midnight is worth a look. It offers memory foam construction that fits your body's contours with middle-of-the-road support.
pros: The most popular model by Helix for it's mid-level support that feels "just right" - not too soft or too firm
Memory foam layers provide reliable support without putting pressure on achy joints
Cover is breathable and works with the foam core for a cooling effect that reduces sweating while you sleep
cons: Not the best choice for back sleepers - some owners with bad backs complain about increased pain after sleeping on it
Some quality control issues have been reported

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING MATTRESS!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really outstanding! I've had a Tempurpedic mattress for 10 years and it's wonderful, but I left it for my ex husband so I needed another one. I was automatically going to purchase a Tempurpedic, but REALLY didn't want to part with $5,000 +, so I looked on Amazon first. Thank God!! The mattress I purchased from AMAZON is perfect, and honestly I'm not able to differentiate it from my former $5,000 Tempurpedic bed. A truly great bed, and a truly great deal!!️
customer_reviews.author: Traci S.

customer_reviews.title: This is the One!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I found the UltraPlush to be too firm. We didn't like that the UltraPlush does not move with you at all, and felt like we were sleeping on a padded slab. We returned the UltraPlush (not as easy as they make it sound; but doable), and we ordered this Hybrid mattress instead. We love this Perfect Cloud Hybrid mattress! It has the soft, plush, cooling memory foam on top, and pocketed coils underneath that give it some movement and a little bounce; more like a traditional mattress. We have been sleeping soundly on this mattress from the get-go (and it's better for "adult" activity.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Thought I loved this bed, but it broke my healthy body after a year use
customer_reviews.text: I am on Amazon searching for a new mattress while I sleep on my couch because this mattress gave me serious hip and back pain to the point I couldn't exercise anymore and had trouble walking and I'm only in my thirties. It took me awhile to even figure out my pain was from this mattress until I experimented not sleeping on it and my pain has vanished after a week. Tried sleeping on it after the pain was gone and it came right back. It is definitely this bed. It is not an uncomfortable bed so you wouldn't think it would hurt your body, but something is wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: lori campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for heavy people - We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mattress for anyone but especially for heavy people. We had purchased another brand initially and had to send it back because it started sagging where we slept and on the edges of each side where we would sit. We have had this Perfect Cloud Hybrid for a few months now and we've had NO problems, not even sore shoulders or hips. It does not even get warm while sleeping. The height is a little more than 11" and so far, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnia Browning

customer_reviews.title: ... a month and so far this mattress has been great! It is super supportive
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for a little over a month and so far this mattress has been great! It is super supportive. I have a decent curve in my lower back and with this mattress I can feel the support in my lower back when lying on my back. There is no gap at my lower back, but I actually feel "support" there. I have slept very well. I'm very happy I decided to purchase this mattress. The price was right, and I feel like I'm the smartest guy on the block for going with the Perfect Cloud Hybrid instead of the big name brands for thousands more. Great job Northbay Products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh - Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress gave me the best sleep I've had in years. The memory foam (soft without sinking in) cuddled my shoulders and hips, the springs gave me the support I wanted, and it was great not waking up during the night from being overheated. It was/is so comfortable, I was (probably) asleep almost immediately because I don't remember fidgeting and rearranging to find a sweet spot. I'd forgotten how wonderful it is to feel so refreshed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia S

customer_reviews.title: Sweating every night.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress for 2 years an 4 month. I really don’t like it. It is hard to get out of bed. I drip sweat, where I am laying on the mattress every night. There is no bounce to it at all, well sex is not happening on this bed. I have a hard time moving around on the mattress. If so many people like it. I would sell it for a 1$. It is going in the trash. I feel I wasted my money. I really tried to get to know the mattress before I gave up. I would not recommend this to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: viv

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mattress for our 87 year old mother's bed. She had slept on a similar type mattress at her daughter's home while visiting and was very impressed. We were a little nervous that she might not be happy with this one without her actually trying it first. We pondered the thought that it might not be the quality of a conventional type mattress. However, she was delighted with it this first week. We ordered the 12 " size because that is the same size as her old mattress and she is not a extremely heavy person. We will not hesitate to purchase our next mattress from the Perfect Cloud lineup of quality mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good for about 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Our prior memory foam mattress was about $225 and lasted about 2 years. We figured spending more on a CertiPUR certified mattress would get us a few years of use, we were wrong. Initially the bed did great for us but the support has died off. (in nine months time) It's been over a year and we are shopping for a new mattress, we are not happy spending $400+ on a disposable mattress.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Oct 2017. Skeptical about memory foam but really needed a mattress that helped me not feel my spouse flip flopping on the other side. Successful on that front. Off gassing we noticed the first week but not too bad. Inflated in 24 hours to the full 12 inches. It is now June 2018 and its still comfortable and still reinflates perfectly. I honestly keep wondering when it will start to break down. Still very happy. Will update when it starts to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pastorelli

customer_reviews.title: “GREAT SUPPORT” GREAT NIGHT SLEEP”🥰
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress 5 years come Christmas. ❣️❣️❣️ So sorry I’m just saying anything about it. We are both, my husband and I, 76 years old. It has been our greatest joy in mattresses in all the years we’ve been married, 59 years. We ordered an all solid oak bed frame with 6 drawers on each side and two long drawers at the end plus two side tables attached with drawers from a family owned company in norther Indiana. We have a very small bedroom😉 No box springs!!!! It still feels like it did when it was new, praise the Lord❣️ Thank you for a great mattress🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Judi Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: First this mattress ships in a box and is vacuumed sealed. It was very easy to take out and unwrap the plastic. It only took a few min for it to pop up. There was a little bit of a smell at first but after a few hours it aired out. This bed is very comfortable. I like that it conforms with your body but you don't feel like you're sinking into the bed. It's still a pretty firm mattress for being memory foam. I also think it's going to hold up very well. I'm used to the coil mattress that end up getting lumpy and don't think this mattress will have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: It only lasted 1 month
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pair of this mattresses, on week one they were great but after only a week it started sinking right away and not dating to my body as I moved during the night. Two months later it was not going back to flat shape at all and 8 months later it’s completely deformed the only reason I’ve kept it so long it’s because I haven’t had money to buy another but for two moths the floor has been my option because this mattress is a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Lidia Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Sleep peacfully on this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mattress. You lay on it, get comfortable and you don't want to move. Excellent total body support. So far, it has worked as described. Also, the lavender is a pleasant smell and makes the sleeping experience all the better.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the daybed/couch set up I wanted in my home office. It's been set up withas the frame so I can put storage boxes underneath. The little sticky dots on the underside of the mattress means it won't slide around on the frame. That's a wonderful feature. I'm going to enjoy the occasional nap on this a great deal. Using thiswonderful body pillow with it. Note that this mattress sat compressed in its box for nearly a year: it unraveled and opened up perfectly from the vacuum seal. Don't be surprised by the small size of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Variable Statistic

customer_reviews.title: and the California King is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I waited about two weeks to write this review, in order to form a more solid opinion. It's the nicest mattress I've slept on. I'm 6' 1", about 165 lbs, and the California King is perfect for me. I had been using a Queen size spring mattress, that was essentially a medieval torture rack. I had no idea why my neck and back were always sore when I woke up. The new Perfect Cloud 12, has seriously improved my sleeping and waking hours.
customer_reviews.author: JSB

customer_reviews.title: So obsessed with this mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the MOST COMFORTABLE MATTRESS I've ever laid on or owned in my entire life. It's amazing! I would've paid 2000 for this mattress but only paid about $600 total. It's the best mattress ever. Got an adjustable frame to put it on and they go wonderfully together! Dream come true! Every night I sleep like a baby and my neck problems are gone! Def recommend (Can't really see the mattress in my photo but it's my set up) everyone who comes over and lays in it never wants to leave hahaha. I'm the envy of all my friends. Just the way it should be ;)
customer_reviews.author: Payton Rain - Misss Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a miracle? Cured my lower back? Either way, awesome bed, awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: Before this bed, I spent over $2,000 on a mattress that I gave away a few months later. I paid 1/4 of that for this and its the most comfortable bed Ive slept on. I have bad lower back problems and since using this bed ( about 2 months now) I have little to no issues. When I bought this bed, my back was in terrible shape, I pulled something and could barely walk. That would happen to me every so often. That went away within 2 days of sleeping on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful! I've had this a couple months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! I've had this a couple months now and while I also bought the pillow topper, I have ZERO complaints and have honestly never slept better! I'm sure it sounds cliche to say that but oh well. I had a springy mattress before this and could not wait to get the memory foam. After not having one for so long I worried my husband would complain that he "sinks" too much into the memory foam. Well he has had nothing but good things to say about it as well. I recommend it (and the pillow topper) highly!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn C.

customer_reviews.title: IT SMELLS
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this bed but I am 1 month in and it still smells like chemicals. The first 3 weeks the smell would wake me up in the middle of the night. I had to put a hypo allergenic cover over the mattress to help with the smell. Also, it was insanely heavy in the box. It was difficult to get into my apt. Also, it is NOT ultra plush. It is on the firm side. I am not returning because I wouldn't know where to start. I am hoping the smell dissipates soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking , firm feeling, great price, we love it.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Wife is a big woman, husband is 6' 175 lbs, we both sleep great on this firm feeling bed. (yes it's firm) You can't tell the other person is in the same bed unless they snore, they move about or get up and other person can't feel it. Would buy again. It don't smell at all after a few hours. It was shipped fast and easy to unpack and install. I believe the 12 " thick has better support for large people and this is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping in this bed for several weeks now and love it! My old bed made my back hurt and I didn't sleep very well. Once I got this bed out of the box and it rose to the height it as supposed to be at, I have been sleeping like a baby ad my back feels much better. Hopefully the memory foam stays supportive for a long time. If not, I will update and let it be known. So far, I lie this mattress a lot and look froward to a good night of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Matress
customer_reviews.text: Overall the mattress is great. Comfort and being able to sleep without waking up with no aches and pains feels fantastic. The only downside is that the mailing services was a big problem. You would assume that Amazon would have delivered it in their truck but instead it was the U.S. Postal service. Since the mattress is very heavy, U.S. postal service refused to deliver and we had to make arrangements to pick it up. Overall, the item itself is perfect but the delivery service was an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: ralphy78

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding so far
customer_reviews.text: As people said it is medium hard. Box looked like he'll but mattress was fine inside. Took it upstairs..very heavy so make sure at least two of you. Left it in spare room as it said 4 to 8 hours...12 hours later you cannot tell in came in box. Nice and cool but tonight we will use after we put mattress cover on. Will give follow up on this in month or so. ..UPDATE: now month plus..still outstanding mattress. .wish there was way to give 6...now just need better pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Links

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly excellent! I was concerned because of the low cost of this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I gambled ordering without ever trying any mattress like this before. It was recommended to me by someone who had been sleeping on it for a year and a half, and loved it. I have always had a spring mattress. I am amazed. It is by far the best mattress I have ever had. I've been sleeping on it for almost one month and what a great night's sleep! I definitely recommend it. 7/3/18 I have been sleeping on my mattress for well over a year now and I still love it! It’s every bit as solid as it was on the first day. It remains an absolutely great mattress for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: The Elegance Perfect Cloud is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping on a latex mattress and having hip pain every morning I switched to a Perfect Cloud Elegance mattress. I slept on a Perfect Cloud at a BNB last year and loved it. The comfort of the Perfect Cloud stuck in my mind and I knew I would like it so I finally ordered one. It was one of the best decisions I have made. I read some of the negative reviews before ordering. Don’t let those negative reviews keep you from having the best sleep imaginable.
customer_reviews.author: Dhammer

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Totally impressed!!! I am not paid to write these, in fact, never do, however I am a proud dad of twins and bought one of these beds to test it out because it looked good along with a good price and I must say I'm beyond impressed. For the price and unbelievable comfortability you can't go wrong. Second reason to get was because I have an 8K King size temperpedic bed and this one comes very close! Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Cal-El

customer_reviews.title: Soft and supported for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great! I am curvy and this mattress is super soft but also very supportive. I was concerned that getting a lower cost mattress was going to mean lower quality. That is definitely not the case here. This is great quality and a great price. I am also considering replacing my king mattress with this model because my husband who says he likes firm mattresses only will sometimes sneak into our spare room where this is located and take a nap on this super soft mattress.
customer_reviews.author: monica0238

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I (and our doggo) have had this mattress for over two years now. It. Is. Amazing. It feels as good as night one still. Comfy. Easy to freshen up and clean. Comfy. Firm but not like mideival torture bed. But not as soft as the clouds in the California Girls music video. It's just right. And did I mention comfy? I'm impressed with the durability after all this time. And the dog loves it. Cause who are we kidding? What matters more than if the dog is happy? Buy it. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: Ladydc4

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for all ages, only one caviat
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy bed, we have a sleep number but bought this for our three year old. We wanted to steer clear of a traditional spring mattress because of our three year old bouncing tendencies. I have found it more comfy than I expected and could easily fall asleep on it. She absolutely LOVES it, and works great for the tons of "plopping " she likes to do. Only reason for four stars is the initial smell, some others complained about. After about a month it has gone away now, but if your smell sensitive, be warned, but I think most people go once blind to it quickly. My wife did, and daughter doesn't seem to notice it at all.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress!! Chose this mattress for our daughter as she transitioned from her toddler bed to a standard twin. Unpacking and set up were easy and straightforward. There was absolutely no smell by the time it was ready to sleep on. Barely any smell upon opening it and removing the shrink wrap!! My daughter and I both love the level of firmness this mattress provides. She definitely sleeps better on this mattress than her previous one! I love it so much, I can’t wait to replace my mattress!! Will be buying this one in the appropriate size for my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tohn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress I have ever slept on, I bought it October 22, 2015 and am now just posting about it. It easily surpasses any mattress I ever slept on and would buy from them again. This mattress is extremely affordable and extremely comfortable. I do feel like I am sleeping on a 'Perfect Cloud'. Just note, this matttess does not need any additional comfort added. No additional foam pads, it is fine even being as thin as it is compared to other memory foam mattresses. This mattress is also medium-firm, it is great for side and back sleepers. I sleep on mainly my back and it has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Easilly worth a grand or more
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredibly comfortable. Ever since finding out that you can buy mattresses online, especially via Amazon, I havent looked back. The quality you get and this ridiculous price makes you constantly wonder why you ever spent most of your life buying over prices mattresses at the box store. The mattress it self, is very very soft and well shape around your body. I like my mattress as far away from firm as possible, and this is right up my alley. I couldnt be happier. No back pain, and I sleep through the night without tossing and turning. If you like a plush/soft mattress, and dont like paying a grand + on a mattress, this is just for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Bear

customer_reviews.title: Dense and soft - like good cake
customer_reviews.text: Spent some time reviewing memory foam mattresses, asked around and ultimately what led me to this decision was the educated and glowing review by the man that compared this to a temperpedic. Thank you, stranger.😂 I’ve only had this bed for a few hours but we are all very happy with it (8 year old back in the bed...). How I would describe this is lying on a slab of Sarah lee pound cake.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: So far I do like the mattress a lot - it was super simple ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the mattress for about two weeks, so it's still a premature review. So far I do like the mattress a lot - it was super simple to remove from the packaging, and expanded to it's final size within a couple of hours, I still let it settle for about 48 hours before sleeping on it. It's fairly firm for a foam mattress, and I like the feel and support quite a bit more than my old tempurpedic. I am not sinking into the bed with the Perfect Cloud mattress like I was with the tempurpedic - it was difficult to roll around in the tempurpedic, but very comfortable to roll around with the perfect cloud.
customer_reviews.author: drydeniv

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this mattress and save yourself the money and hassle of the more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mattress and at a great price. I have been using this now for the past two or three weeks and have slept much better. I was slightly skeptical due to the price but I was definitely wrong. I have had an innerspring mattress for years and have wanted a memory foam mattress but didn't want to fork out $1k or more for one but this came in at a great price and sleeps just as well as the really expensive mattresses. One great thing about it is that you don't sweat yourself to death on this one, I'm a hot sleeper and have loved this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cloud, perfect sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Queen-sized Perfect Cloud mattress a little over a year ago and it is the most comfortable mattress I have ever owned. It is nice and cool when I first get into bed which I love and has the perfect level of firmness. It has not indented in any detectable way even after a year of use. I purchased a full-sized just recently for my son so I could spread the joy of a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Zilch

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mother-In-Law
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my elderly mother in law. It was amazing how it unfolded. We were able to get it set up for her very easily. Her initial thoughts were that it was very comfortable. In talking to her today she said she had a good night sleep. She said it is firmer than she is accustomed to, but I explained that with memory foam mattresses, it usually takes a couple of weeks to get used to. Overall we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Watts

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a concrete floor!
customer_reviews.text: I've slept on Tempurpedics, Angelbeds, and other various memory foam mattresses in the past, to greater or lesser degrees of comfort. I understand the huge differences between conventional, hybrid, and foam mattresses, as I've owned and slept on all 3 types. This bed is miserably hard. Even my husband, who is average height and weight and favors a very firm mattress, finds this mattress uncomfortably hard. We've only owned it for 3 months, but we're going to have to replace it because it really can't be slept on. A colossal waste of money! 💸💸💸😩
customer_reviews.author: MVM718

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I waited 2 years to write this review. This mattress is amazing. It looks and feels exactly as it did the day it arrived. This mattress will make you look forward to going to bed. I consider this one of the best purchases I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Susan P Wallace

customer_reviews.title: She researched mattresses for sciatica and this mattress seemed like a good fit
customer_reviews.text: My wife has severe sciatica only able to sleep 2 hours at a time trying every sleep able surface in the house. She researched mattresses for sciatica and this mattress seemed like a good fit. In desperation went out on a limb and purchased this mattress site unseen. The first night she slept on it she got 5 hours of sleep and now she's fighting to get up every morning, which means she's getting back to herself! Excellent buy if you have Sciatica and the price is amazing for the quality. Also super fast FREE shipping for a Mattress, does come compressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua F.

customer_reviews.title: Softens a lot over time
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was considerably softer after 30 days compared to when it arrived. It clearly softened where we slept, but not in areas that were not used, and we are not heavy people. I returned it because I assumed it would continue to get softer and sag. If you rotate this very regularly, maybe the breakdown would stay even. Don’t return it right away if you think it’s too hard if you want something softer. It was perfect for me when it first arrived, just don’t think I would be able to return it after a year or two and don’t trust it to last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was going to wait a month to do this, but I just can't! I have been sleeping on a Cloud for 10 nights (after letting the bed expand and air-out for about 40 hours). I'm 60+, 320 lbs., with an extreme sensitivity to heat, especially when sleeping. I've delayed a new bed purchase for YEARS, enduring pain in my hips, hot nights, in an OLD inner spring mattress. Now I sleep through the night, wake up rested & pain free! There's no "chemical odor". The bed is firm (a must have for the overweight) and deep pocket queen sheets fit it perfectly. A great value!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is 10 years, Cool gel not as expected. Still waiting...
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks in. Delivered Oct 2. Its Oct 15 now. Not exactly what I was expecting. I don't feel the cool gel. I lay on my back and it still feels warm. Giving it another week. Bob's Furniture Sport Hybrid Mattress is a similar cost and 25 year warranty. This mattress comes with a 10 year warranty. Its better than some mattresses... but it's not living up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase. Almost 2 years in
customer_reviews.text: Bought in April of 2016. Has been one of the best purchases made to date. I’m not sure how people are complaining that this mattress is “too firm”, I definitely wouldn’t call it firm. I have a different memory foam mattress that I purchased online and it is much more firm. I imagine many of the reviews are from people who are not used to memory foam or are used to a very soft mattress. Either way, people are allowed to have their opinions... as for me and my wife... we both would agree that this has been a very good mattress. And for the price, you can’t beat it
customer_reviews.author: Penjamin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Night.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to set up. We were able to sleep on it 8 hours later. Very comfortable. I like the fact that even though my husband often gets up and down throughout the night, my side doesn't move. Third mattress we have bought as we put two others in our motorhome. Liked them so much we put this in our new house. Helps with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I hoped for a comfortable yet firm mattress and this turns out to be the right buy for me. It's perfect for sleeping and other activities I have on my bed. Fast delivery, easy to unpack, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RaulKing

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bed prone to mold though
customer_reviews.text: This has been a comfortable bed for us but we have had to treat it for mold and then when we did it stained. We only learned after purchasing and reading te iews that it is very important if you buy a foam mattress to put a cover over the original cover because just sweat or dampiness will ruin the mattress and cause issues we are now replacing our bed after a year if you buy please get a plastic cover they don't say to but you should.
customer_reviews.author: Krista D

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this one although it's not it as soft as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this memory foam mattress after reading plenty of reviews in all price ranges and testing some of the most expensive ones out at mattress stores. I truly love this one although it's not it as soft as I thought it would be. It's a little closer to firm then soft. I don't mind it but my boyfriend thinks it a little too firm for him (200lbs). I sleep much better than I did on a regular matress. I would definitely recommend this bed especially if you're looking for something in this price range. But if you're looking for something that it soft, look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bennett

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and..
customer_reviews.text: I still love this mattress (King size). It was a little firm the first couple weeks but after that it has been perfect to sleep on. Why someone would pay 3 times the price from a mattress store is beyond me, especially with the return options.
customer_reviews.author: C. Albanese

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had this mattress for 2 weeks before the bed it was intended for finally arrived. And oh my gosh! Soooooo comfortable. I don't even need a topper for this one, LOVE this mattress, will most likely order a second for my guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I've become addicted to sleeping on this matress
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for about six months now; I originally ordered it for a spare bedroom, and it has become by far my favorite thing to sleep on. I find myself more and more often sneaking off to the spare room to catch some Z's rather than sleeping in the king sized master. It seems to always be the perfect compromise between firm and soft, it breathes, so I never sweat while sleeping on it, and I have enjoyed it so much that I'm buying a 2nd this month.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: A great mattress at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of sleeping on it, both my husband and I are very satisfied with our mattress. It arrived compacted in a box that was very heavy but then unrolled and puffed up beautifully - it is very tricky to move once unrolled so I suggest placing it either on or next to your bed to unfurl. The mattress is definitely softer than I expected (which is a good thing) and doesn't sleep hot. I would highly recommend Perfect Cloud and would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindi O.

customer_reviews.title: No morning back pain
customer_reviews.text: The name of this mattress is perfect cloud and it's appropriate that is what it feels like floating on a cloud with head to toe support. Wow!!! I can sleep on my back and fall asleep fast not with my old mattress.I usually sleep on my side and now I can without getting a hip pointer.The real good news is for the first time in a very long time i haven't reached for pain killers first thing in the morning!!!! To add to this sleeping experience i have purchased from Amazon a buckwheat pillow witch is the only way to fly and soft flannel sheets.I am one happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Theibault

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable all through the night!

My decision to replace my California King Mattress with this mattress was a good one. The quality of my sleep has been better and I don’t wake up with a stiff back.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lengel

customer_reviews.title: Found my package in the soaking rain!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bed in a box. Unfortunately it was delivered to my upstairs neighbors stairs, instead of using the special delivery instructions that I always use. Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ADEM T. THYNE

customer_reviews.title: Luckily we had a tempurpedic topper and it's perfect. I have arthritis in my back and a ...
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted the 12' mattress because it's a little softer than this one. We slept on it one night and it was a little more firm than what we wanted. Luckily we had a tempurpedic topper and it's perfect. I have arthritis in my back and a bulging disc in my lower back and I used to always wake up with a sore back from sleeping on my stomach and sore shoulders from laying on my side but all aches and pains gone. Love this mattress. When we get a spare room will purchase the 12'. As good as a tempurpedic.
customer_reviews.author: christian menk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mattress I have ordered. One for home, one for cottage. Husband has hip pain but this mattress works great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Schoonveld

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've tryed many different mattresses over the years and returned them all untill this one. This thing is perfect! It is plush yet firm enough for a big guy like myself. 6ft 250lbs. And soft enough for my wife, 5ft7" 140lbs. It has been just over 2 years since I've had it and needed to write a review. Most mattresses would have low spots or sag by now. With my weight and not being able to flip newer mattresses they tend to wear out and sag. This one has absolutely no sag on it. None!! It's comfortable and it holds up? Wow!!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Burkman

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: At the time buying this mattress 5 years ago, I was a nurse working the night shift. I was suffering from chronic knee pain and was having difficulty sleeping at night. Pain was keeping me up. I researched buying a new mattress for weeks before purchasing and ran across this one that appealed to me most. BEST PURCHASE EVER!!!! Everybody loves my bed. My girlfriend is probably only dating me because my bed is so comfy. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kymm

customer_reviews.title: After 1.5 years there are indents where we sleep
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mattress for 1.5 years. First 8-12 months it was amazing. We rotate it pretty regularly, perhaps not enough. But now my wife and I have indents where we sleep. The middle of the mattress is still firm and considerably higher up when we’re laying in the bed. So much so that we don’t even roll towards each other as we’re “stuck” in the indent when sleeping. My back is now starting to suffer. It’s a shame as we did like it originally but I can’t buy a new one every 1-1.5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Z3RO

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love our new bed!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!!!!! Why did we not do this sooner??? This is by far one of the best items we've purchased from Amazon. I was a bit concerned about buying a bed without trying it first but I'm so happy we took a chance. Both my husband and I are side sleepers. Before this bed, we would wake up numerous times each night and then in the morning be in pain. Now, we sleep through the night and wake up feeling refreshed.......WITH NO PAIN!!!!!!! Our bodies literally sink in like it's giving us a hug when we go to bed. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE our new bed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hill

customer_reviews.title: and it is most excellent. I live in Florida where the summers are ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this bed for awhile now, and it is most excellent. I live in Florida where the summers are long and hot. Unlike other foam mattresses, this one does not build up heat and wake you up in the night. Also, as long as you rotate your mattress properly, you can break this bed in even and not have that sinking in the center some people claim to have. Friends/family have laid in this bed and thought it was quite comfortable and then shocked to find out I paid so little for it compared to other foam mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: DanielD

customer_reviews.title: This bed started out strong and finished like junk after three years.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for three years, I've rotated properly and used a mattress protector as advised here. BACK PAIN in the morning and I've contacted Perfect Cloud with no help on warranty questions. I do not reccomend the bed unless you are ok with the three year use and replace. This bed started out strong and finished like junk.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! This ain’t it...
customer_reviews.text: Re-writing this review. Buyer Beware! Not even 4 Years after purchase, we are sleeping in sags. My head hurts almost every morning because my neck gets crooked. This mattress traps heat and we go from sweating to freezing then back to sweating. I begged my husband to buy the Purple mattress but he wanted to try this first. Lesson learned. Seriously...we sleep in body sized divots. It’s terrible. Can’t flip it. Can only turn it and it doesn’t make any difference. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress...perfect cloud elegance 12in...
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I ever owned Was kind of wary about ordering online but Amazon has such a great return policy and I seen some of the returns in the reviews(but was no need to even consider return)...I’m a big guy 6”2 and 230lbs...had mattress a few weeks and holds up firm I can’t do too soft mattress and sink in....make sure you read reviews that match the model ur getting most bad ones are from the cheapest model perfect cloud elegance 12in...
customer_reviews.author: Armando Esqueda

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was really scared ordering this mattress in case we didn't like it and the return would be a nightmare. But I am super happy to report that this was one of the best purchases we've ever made. It was delivered quickly, we popped it out and left to "inflate" for a good 10 hours and had the best nights sleep in a very long time. The mattress is medium firm to firm, in my opinion, not sink in but comfortable and conforming. And the price is unbelievable! We got to save thousands of dollars compared to store prices, for the same great quality! Been sleeping on it for over six months now and still so stoked!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Initial Results Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My wife has back problems and our old very firm mattress was causing her major discomfort. She received many recommendations to try a memory foam mattress. I did a little internet investigating and Perfect Cloud was highly recommended. The Amazon price was the clincher - if the memory foam experiment fails I only wasted a little over $400 rather than the $1500 to $3000 price I was getting for the more popular brand names. She has used the mattress for less than a week but so far the results have been excellent. No pain getting to sleep or waking up. If the "memory" of the mattress stays consistent I think we have a definite winner.
customer_reviews.author: Phillers

customer_reviews.title: It was like sleeping on a brick
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I have the queen size certain of this bed and it's amazing. All I wanted was a bigger version of the same bed, but what we got was a brick. It inflated and all of a sudden felt like an extremely old memory foam pillow at the end of its life. I was waiting for it to feel like the other bed. I tried taking a heater to it,leaving it in another room, but no... nothing so we ordered the atlas , which I can't say thatbi like too much but we just staked them for now.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Iriele

customer_reviews.title: The bed sags within a week
customer_reviews.text: I am a 135lb 5'5 25 yo female (not very heavy!), and found that the bed sagged under my hips while offering significant, even too much, support under my shoulders. This made for an uncomfortable experience waking up in the morning with my pelvis deep inside the bed and my shoulders and neck propped up. I had back pain a couple of times and returned it. If there was more support under the hips, and a little softer under the shoulders, I honestly think it would be amazing. But because the opposite was true, and it gave me back pain, I don't recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: srucara

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent... Perfect Cloud Ultra Plush Gel-Max 10 Inch
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of the Perfect Cloud Gel Max 10 inch. Even my husband, who was extremely skeptical about ordering a “bed in a box”, is very pleasantly surprised! The bed itself is on the firm side, so hopefully it will keep its shape for years to come. The “smell”, referred to in other reviews, disapated in a couple of days. It looks exactly like the picture and is very comfortable. It sleeps cool, thankfully since I suffer from night sweats. My sheets, which I used on my 13” innerspring, fit this bed better. We never expected this quality in a mattress for this price, I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ...Ranger's Fan

customer_reviews.title: I saved over a thousand
customer_reviews.text: I was going to get a similar bed from a local retailer for about $1500. So I saved over a thousand and didn't need to deal with a couple knuckle heads delivering the new bed and invading my bedroom. It sleeps good, a bit firmer than I'm used to but don't haven't had any back pain since I've been sleeping on it(for about a month). It does get a little warm sometimes and I always run my a/c cold(65-67) at night. Other than that it is a good value and would reccomend because I'm pretty sure there has not been any beds invented that do not hold some heat from human bodies during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Max Deal

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy.
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought a mattress online, let alone one that came in a box. But after researching and reading the reviews I decided to buy. Follow the easy instructions for set up and DO NOT use a knife or anything sharp to open the box or to remove the wrapper from the mattress. I've had the mattress for 4 months now, and there are no issues. The quality is excellent. I'm be pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a GREAT bed that will help alleviate back pain
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a GREAT bed that will help alleviate back pain, this is it! I purchased one to replace the mattress in my travel trailer. It was so comfortable that when I rented a house I bought two more...one for myself and one for my son's room. We both LOVE this mattress. It isn't too soft, but isn't too hard, either. It's what I like to call the Goldilocks mattress...JUST right.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S Chane

customer_reviews.title: Love these mattresses they are very comfortable would highly recommend

I love the way I sleep on this best mattress I have ever had and the price was amazing. Shipping was great also even received them 1 day earlier then scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Lance E Burnell

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Taking it out and it inflated just fine. At first when I sleep on it

I work 12 hour shifts at the hospital so i needed a bed that help me back pains and legs. The bed did hold some heat but not too bad. After some time now, the bed still reatains its shape but with some depressions when I lay. Not my body tends to ache again. I'm not sure if it's the bed or me.
customer_reviews.author: mtran

customer_reviews.title: First impression the bed is the high quality it claims to be.

It's just been a few hours but this bed is already the 12 inches it claimed it would be, and I am very relieved about that because a friend got a cheap 8 inch bed and it never got close to the advertised thickness. So far this bed seems comfortable but I'll have to sleep on it to be sure. Extremely pleased for now. Over a year has gone by and still love it. No dents or dips.
customer_reviews.author: Randomchick

customer_reviews.title: Disabled Vet - helps on my broken body
customer_reviews.text: I'm a disabled veteran with lots of hip and back pain. There's a huge difference on my body depending on the mattress I sleep on. We bought this mattress for our camper and oh my what an amazing mattress. I can feel a huge difference on my body. It's so comfortable. My only issue is that it smelled so bad of chemicals when it arrived. We left it outside for a few days. I'm not a fan of breathing in stuff while I sleep but this mattress works. I wish I knew for sure what the toxicity levels were. Air it out for a bit when you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Stop questioning and hit add it to cart!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to sleep on this for a bit before making a review. This has to be the BEST bed I have ever slept on. I did notice the smell others talked about but it wasn't that strong and I do have a sensitive nose (cannot go down candle isle). It isn't so soft you feel like your sinking but not so firm you feel you must roll over often. I have a fitbit and tells me my sleeping patterns. I sleep better on this than I ever did on a normal mattress. Thank you Perfect cloud for offering such a wonderful product! Please keep it affordable and such good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah B. Commons

customer_reviews.title: I've been using it for over 3 years and I still love it!

customer_reviews.author: Shell Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress without a huge price.

That is saying something because about 2 weeks ago, he broke a rib in his back from being rear-ended and so has been in a lot of pain. He says that when he is laying down on the bed, it does not bother him. I would highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swihart

This is a great short-term mattress but if you are looking for something more long term then I would dish out a little extra money to get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.author: shiane

If your health and safety is important to you, go with this one. We love it, and so does our big boy!

It is also, not to soft, or to firm.

customer_reviews.title: If you want to sleep well, this is your bed.

I will never order a different brand of mattress! I have a bad back so I need a firm enough mattress for support so I do not wake up in pain. However I prefer soft pillow top styled mattresses. This mattress is literally the perfect combination of both!!!! It's like sleeping on a cloud. I get the best sleep on it!! Best of all its not some overly priced mattress that will hurt your pockets! It comes vacuum sealed and takes no time for it to expand properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I was certainly hesitant at the prospect of ordering a mattress online...especially a mattress in a box! But my fears were unfounded. This mattress, so far, as I've only had it a few weeks, is exactly as described! I even had to leave it it in the box for approximately two weeks, since it arrived a day after I left on vacation. And there was no problem at all leaving it in there for that long. I'm sure it would have lasted several weeks longer, if necessary, judging by its performance. I am looking forward to using it for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Mengle

customer_reviews.title: Best Nights Sleep Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a while before writing this review. It's been 2 years sleeping on this mattress and every night is like the first time laying on it. Packaging was easy, definitely need a strong arm if you have stairs when it's delivered. Fill out in about 2 to 3 hours. I originally got a used a microfiber water resistant cover, but now I only use 600 to 800 thread Egyptian cotten and that adds to the luxurious rest that I get. I suggest getting a metal "box spring" so the mattress can breath. I hands down love this mattress and so does anyone that lays across my bed (family, friends, boyfriend). Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda

customer_reviews.title: ... had our for about a month now and really enjoy it. Took some getting use to at first ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had our for about a month now and really enjoy it. Took some getting use to at first but only because it does not feel like a traditional mattress like we've always been accustomed to. My fiancée has suffered from inflammation in her hip at times and this has helped A LOT at relieving those pressure points. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Side Sleeper Plush Twin Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is amazing and exactly as described. It unrolls and fluffs as instructed to a twin size soft mattress for a side sleeper. The size fits a standard twin bed and provides a lush mattress for a deep, soft slumber. Its cover unzips for machine washing as needed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Penny R. Pancerev

It's only been 1 night so I'll be back in a few weeks to update my review. So far I'm extremely pleased with my purchase and Amazon customer service's help in tracking down my lost package.

Exceeded expectations, never heard of this company before but Im very very happy I took the chance. If you have aches and pains, this could help immensely no kidding. On time, easy set up. Couldnt believe the price either. With the return policy, whats to risk? Nothing, and its a huge winner. I'm 49 and am loving this super buy. If I were to buy a extravagant gift for somebody with pain issues, this would be the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe DMann

customer_reviews.title: We love this new mattress

This is a firm b d but I love that you don’t sink in. We also sleep with two pit bulls and it makes it so much better. I used to feel like I was falling in a hole all night. Not now. Sleep firm and straight. Finally thank goodness.

customer_reviews.title: Not what we were hoping for
customer_reviews.text: We tried to get this to avoid spending thousands of dollars on a mattress, but it didn't do the trick. This mattress was way too soft, and offered no support. We could feel the support wood in the box spring beneath just by adjusting our bodies (and we are a 215lb man and a 135lb woman). Would not recommend unless you want an EXTREMELY soft bed. It is, however, very nice looking, and worked well on the floor when we had guests. To each their own, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: just perfect. We have had this a little over 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband's back problems seemed to stop almost immediately! Not too soft, not too firm...just perfect. We have had this a little over 2 months and still love it. We don't want to get out of bed in the morning and we use any excuse to lay in it. The name is fitting....feels like you're sleeping on a cloud. The only issue I have is I wish I would've ordered one sooner! I've told several people about this and a friend also ordered theirs!
customer_reviews.author: J Carter

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace a worn out pillow top mattress. We looked at mattresses in furniture stores that were similar to the Perfect Cloud and they were significantly more expensive than this one so after reading so many positive reviews, we bought it. It arrived more quickly than expected, it was easy to unpack and didn't have any odor at all. We let it "rest" for 8 hours and it came up to 9 3/4 inches. We've only had it for five nights but already I've noticed much less back pain. It's a little harder than I expected but will probably become softer after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister. She loves it. It replaced a 10 yr old expensive mattress. She said that it's been one of the most comfortable beds she's slept on and also that she likes that she doesn't "sink" into it. She's had no issues with "dents" in the mattress over the course of 3 or 4 months, which is great considering she is a bit on the heavier side. All in all, very happy with this purchase.
